metadata.rawFilterList:
! Checksum: EbBcKQqmQ54BbIE4Siw89w
! Title: Filter unblocking search ads and self-promotion
! Description: Filter that unblocks search ads in Google, DuckDuckGo, Bing, or Yahoo and self-promotion on websites.
! Version: 2.0.3.61
! TimeUpdated: 2025-01-18T19:38:24+00:00
! Expires: 10 days (update frequency)
! Homepage: https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardFilters
! License: https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/LICENSE
!
!---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
!-------------- Advertising networks ---------------------------------------!
!---------------------------------------------------------------------------!
!
! This section contains the list of the rules that unblock contextual (and only contextual) ads on the search engine result pages. Rules should be domain-specific.
!
! Good: example.org#@#.ad
! Bad:  @@||example.org^$stealth (should be in AdGuard Base - allowlist_stealth.txt)
!
!
!
!-------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
!----------------------------- Search engine result pages ----------------------!
!-------------------------------------------------------------------------------!
!
! Bing (only for Edge)
!
!
!
! *** CAUTION: all rules below are wrapped by AG directive. Don't remove it, and don't add another directives***
!
!#safari_cb_affinity(general)
!
! Bing
!
bing.com#@#li[class="b_ans"][data-partnertag]:has(> div[class^="b_bza_"])
bing.com#@#.b_adLastChild
bing.com#@$#body .b_adLastChild { display: block !important; position: absolute !important; top: -9999px !important; }
bing.com#@$#body .pa_carousel_mlo { display: block !important; position: absolute !important; top: -9999px !important; }
bing.com#@#.shop_page .br-poleoffcarousel
bing.com#@#.adsMvC
bing.com#@##b_content > div#pole > div[class="ra_car_block ra_pole"] > div.ra_car_container
bing.com#@$#.b_ad { position: absolute!important; left: -3000px!important; }
bing.com#@#.sb_adTA
bing.com#@#.b_adPATitleBlock
bing.com#@#.b_adPATitleBlock + div
bing.com#@##b_content > main > #b_results > li:not(.b_algo):not(.b_ans):not(.b_mop):not(.b_pag)
bing.com#@?##b_results > li.b_algo:has(> .b_caption > p:matches-css(before, content: /^(Ad|Ann\.|Annonce|Anúncio|Anzeige|Reklama|Реклама|Reclamă|Publicidade)$/))
bing.com#@?##b_results > li:has(> h2 + .b_caption > div.b_attribution:not([u]) + p[class])
bing.com#@?##b_results > .b_algo:has(> .b_caption > .b_attribution:matches-css(before, content: /url\(data:image/))
bing.com#@#.b_spa_adblock
bing.com#@#.b_bza_pole
bing.com#@#.ra_car_block
@@||r.bat.bing.com/?ld=
!
! Yahoo
!
carview.yahoo.co.jp#@##ad_SS
search.yahoo.co.jp#@#.sw-Card.Ad
@@||search.yahoo.com^$document
!
! Google
!
